snippet: The pixels were barely dry on After Deadline's previous roundup of sound-alike mix-ups when the file began to fill up again. Probably a coincidence. Still, let's be more careful with those homophones. The good news is that several of these lapses...
abstract: The pixels were barely dry on After Deadline's previous roundup of sound-alike mix-ups when the file began to fill up again. Probably a coincidence. Still, let's be more careful with those homophones. The good news is that several of these lapses were fixed in later versions.
